about.description: Hello! I'm Alberto, a passionate Senior Frontend Developer based in Madrid, Spain. With extensive experience in developing modern web applications and a strong background in full-stack and backend development, I look forward to creating innovative solutions and shaping the digital world.
about.goalOfWebsite: The goal of this website is to showcase my skills and experiences, attract potential employers or clients, and connect with the tech community.
